amendment.description: Amendment sought to create a revenue stream through the elimination of a subsidy that allowed irrigators to repay project debt with no interest.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 112-405 to create a revenue stream through the elimination of a subsidy that allowed irrigators to repay project debt with no interest.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Napolitano amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 250 (Roll no. 87).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Napolitano amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 250 (Roll no. 87).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mrs. Napolitano.
